metadata.title: CVE-2023-4421 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
tlsfuzzer code can still detect timing issues in RSA operations

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4421` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.92-1
libnss3-tools - 2:3.92-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.92-1').
